MESSAGE.JP: なら何をしても気づかれそうにもない。
MESSAGE.EN: I think I could do anything to her now and she wouldn't even notice.
MESSAGE.Translation: I think I could do anything to her now and she wouldn't even notice.

MESSAGE.JP: 会があったら今度何かしてみよう。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe I'll try something next time I have a chance.
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe I'll try something next time I have a chance.
